title: An unenclosed porch open on three sides, not more than 5
clause_text: An unenclosed porch open on three sides, not more than 5.5 m in length parallel to the main building in front of common entrance only and except rear open space with level difference of 0.3 m in relation to the floor levelas specified in Regulation No. 37 (18). No part of such porch shall be less than 1.5 m from the plot boundary. A balcony may be permitted as specified in Regulation No.37(20).
section: Other features permitted in open space:
